title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s own repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by the local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node or browsers via the Ollama REST endpoint.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chat, generation and embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark/light themes, mobile friendly).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; ingest PDFs and chat with your docs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama’s REST API with readline, history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, POJO mapping, Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server plus optional web UI.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, completion, embeddings and model management with IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-gpt-cli
summary: Terminal UI reminiscent of ChatGPT-CLI but backed by local Ollama models instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for building LLM pipelines.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama; zero-dependency TypeScript client that works in Node or browser.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package; lightweight Python wrapper for the Ollama REST API with sync & async clients.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template that combines Ollama LLM with Chroma DB for question answering over custom documents.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local Ollama models into your workspace with DM and channel support.
